Plot: A man and a woman, secretly in love, alone in a room. They desire each other, want each other, and even bite each other. In the afterglow, they share a few sweet nothings. At least the man ...
Title: The Blue Room
Writer: Stéphanie Cléau (screenplay), Mathieu Amalric (screenplay), Georges Simenon (novel)
Actors: Mathieu Amalric, Léa Drucker, Stéphanie Cléau, Laurent Poitrenaux
tomatoConsensus: The Blue Room proves a sobering study of the dark side of human nature, as well as a coolly assured directorial effort from star and co-writer Mathieu Amalric.
